title: The Proposition 4: The Ferro Family
description: Blackmail. Sex. FerroThere are some mistakes that are too big to fix. I’ll never recover from this one. Damn it, I called Bryan an addict and treated him worse. Maybe it was wrong for him to approach me the way he did. Maybe it wasn’t right for Bryan to just take what he wanted, consequences be damned. I can’t blame him, though–not now that I know the truth.Genre: New Adult RomanceThis story unfolds over 5 volumes approx. 125 pages each.
author: H.M. Ward
